name: Collision Course (itch) (Deliriny2020)
description:
Made for the $100 Game Jam Hosted By JoeJoe

So I decided to enter a game jam! The theme was ‘Moon Light’ with a limitation of it having to have two buttons and only two buttons outside the regular movement.

So my take on the theme was, the moon provides the light for the earth, and you have to keep it going! But with a twist 😏. Oh god that looks creepy. Eh whatever I’ll leave the emoji there.

Shout out and thanks to ThePandoroxTP for composing music and doing sound design!

YouTube:  https://youtube.com/channel/UCRfjZwCrosi1jzbyMgs_4lA

Newgrounds: https://thepandoroxtp.newgrounds.com/

Anyways, if you like it, make sure to comment!

If you didn’t like it, make sure to comment anyways!

Have a great day!

-Deliriny2020
